title: Barbados' Special Needs Education Praised (Government of Barbados - Office of the Prime Minister)
text: ( Source : Government of Barbados - Office of the Prime Minister ) Education Minister , Ronald Jones ; his St. Lucian counterpart, Dr. Robert Lewis ; and Senator Harry Husbands taking the salute at this morning's Education Parade and Route March.
